articles.title: ‘An existential threat’: For Silicon Valley, falling behind in AI is a bigger threat than tariffs
articles.summary: If there’s one thing the White House, Wall Street and Silicon Valley can agree on, it’s that artificial intelligence is a top priority.

articles.title: OpenAI's Sam Altman says AI market is in a bubble
articles.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman thinks the artificial intelligence market is in a bubble, similar to the dotcom bubble, he recently told reporters.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI's Sam Altman says AI market is in a bubble

articles.title: Foxconn and SoftBank to make data centre equipment in Ohio for Stargate project
articles.summary: Foxconn's said on Monday it plans to manufacture data centre equipment with Japan's SoftBank at the Taiwanese firm's former electric vehicle factory in Ohio, part of the Stargate project to advance U.S. artificial intelligence infrastructure.

articles.title: Trump’s Plans for A.I. Might Hit a Wall. Thank Europe.
articles.summary: The president wants to unleash American artificial intelligence companies on the world, but Europe can still stand in his way.

articles.title: An Asian data center hub is quietly grappling with AI's massive costs
articles.summary: Malaysia's state of Johor, a fast-growing data center hub, is coming up against the growing water and energy needs of the world's artificial intelligence boom.
